column3: Thanks, however see the notes in [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-philosophy) and discussion in #15465 as to why code formatting PRs are essentially automatically closed. By the way, if you think that code formatting is prohibiting contributions in any way, it'd be great to get your thoughts in #15465.\n\n> I targeted a line-length of
